title: How to inspire success - Everything - Quora

response.answer_text: This same question whenever I try to answer, I wish and believe it will change the views of people and make them practical and realise the real success. We are programmed by our society about what to do and what not to do to get the so called “Success”. We just follow the way that is more related to our society and what Sharma ji ka beta/beti did at our age. We are also at the same time told by some influencers that we all are not the same. We all have different kinds of skills and potential. We should follow our passion. But the thing gets more complicated here. Now we are absolutely confused about the term SUCCESS and how to get that prefix to our name so that we can become examples for our little bros and sisters. I have had the same thing happening with me before. But now as I'm quite thoughtful and observing the differences between the “Success to show off” and the “Real Success within us”, I am so happy and writing this to make you all realise the true meaning of Success. It is very simple as it is said by many but to get it simple you have to be very disciplined and honest to yourself first. See if you have a lot of money, but to earn that much you forget your life and family, then there will be no peace there and you are not successful. Similarly if you have your good relationships but no money here you are not successful either. So how to be successful???? To conclude, if you are happy and enjoying what you do daily and also for that your personal life not get poised and therefore your relationships are strong enough to support you, at that time you will realise the PEACE. And if you are at peace of your mind, it is the original SUCCESS. So try not to get more money or more power or more of something. Just follow your mind, not heart. If you are satisfied with yourself then you are the most successful person. Thank you.
